embed.description:
EssentialsX officially supports the **CraftBukkit**, **Spigot**, and [**Paper (recommended)**](https://papermc.io/) server software running the following Minecraft versions:
‚Ä¢ ‚úÖ **1.19.4** and **1.20.1** - EssentialsX actively develops against and supports these versions.
‚Ä¢ ‚ö†Ô∏è **1.8.8**, **1.9.4**, **1.10.2**, **1.11.2**, **1.12.2**, **1.13.2**, **1.14.4**, **1.15.2**, **1.16.5**, **1.17.1**, and **1.18.2** - these versions are still supported, but are not a priority for us, and may be dropped in a future release.

EssentialsX **does not support** the following Minecraft versions and server software:

footer.text: We will not be able to provide support if you use any of the unsupported software or versions listed above.

fields.name: ‚Ä¢ ‚ÑπÔ∏è Folia
fields.value:
**Folia is not supported yet.** We are working on proper Folia support.
**Do not attempt to use current versions of EssentialsX on Folia or forks of it - you may lose userdata.**

fields.name: ‚Ä¢ üõë "Ultra-performance" Paper forks
fields.value: This includes Akarin, Yatopia, and similar projects - these often perform non-standard behavior and can break your worlds and installed plugins.

fields.name: ‚Ä¢ üõë Mohist
fields.value:
[The Mohist project is known to be sketchy, and has, in the past, tricked users into deleting official EssentialsX jars and installing an unofficial build.](https://essentialsx.net/do-not-use-mohist.html)
We cannot guarantee the safety or functionality of unofficial builds of EssentialsX; you should avoid using Mohist where possible.

fields.name: ‚Ä¢ üõë Other Forge/Bukkit hybrid servers including Cauldron, Thermos, Magma, CatServer, etc
fields.value:
EssentialsX is built for the Bukkit API, which does not properly support mods.
For Forge servers, use [SpongeForge](https://www.spongepowered.org/downloads/spongeforge) with [Nucleus](https://nucleuspowered.org), or an alternative mod for [Forge/Fabric](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods).

fields.name: ‚Ä¢ üõë 1.7.10 or below
fields.value: Please don't use versions that were made <t:1403740800:R>
